subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A slapshot from the Bruins’ Blake Wheeler was the only goal Henrik Lundqvist allowed, but the Bruins held off their opponents to put the Rangers’ postseason chances on the knife’s edge.
snippet: A slapshot from the Bruins’ Blake Wheeler was the only goal Henrik Lundqvist allowed, but the Bruins held off their opponents to put the Rangers’ postseason chances on the knife’s edge.
